aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Learn more about our mission, vision and our values
aboutPage.missionText: Deliver high-quality, minimalist fashion that enhances everyday life while supporting sustainable practices.
aboutPage.visionText: Become a global leader in sustainable fashion, known for timeless designs and excellent customer experiences.
aboutPage.valuesText: Integrity, sustainability, creativity, and customer satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.
aboutPage.whoWeAreText1: Echo Store is a premium e-commerce platform committed to bringing minimalist, high-quality fashion to your doorstep. Founded with a passion for design and quality, our goal is to create products that elevate everyday style.
aboutPage.whoWeAreText2: We believe in sustainable practices, fair sourcing, and providing our customers with exceptional experiences from browsing to delivery.

contactPage.heroSubtitle: Have a question or feedback? We’d love to hear from you.

faqPage.heroSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about Echo Store. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment gateway.

q2.question: Why was my payment declined?
q2.answer: Payment declines can happen for several reasons: insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or security blocks from your bank. Please verify your information and try again. If the issue persists, contact your bank or try a different payment method.

q1.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
q1.answer: No, you can checkout as a guest. It only takes a minute to sign up!

q2.question: How can I contact customer service?
q2.answer: You can reach us via email at edgarfezeu@gmail.com, or call us at +237 693 14 34 59. View contact page. We typically respond to emails within 24 hours.

productGrid.tryAnother: Try another category or search term.
